Function Documentation

signalNewDiagnosticsReportEvent ( $  report_date = '',
$  script_name = 'labor_test_findings_printpop.php' 
)

signalNewDiagnosticsReportEvent will set an event instance in the care_nursing_station_patients_diagnostics_report table signalling the availability of a report. param $report_date = the date (in local format) of the creation of the report param $script_name = the script string that will be used to run the display of the report return
